alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 2:56AM PDT until March 28 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * CHANGES...Lake Wind Advisory is being replaced by a wind advisory as winds have trended stronger across the region. * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Wave heights on Pyramid Lake 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust will be possible this morning and early afternoon before rain moves into the region. This may bring periods of reduced visibility to I-80, US-50, and US-95.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
